data.name: abjure
data.detail: promise or swear to give up

data.name: abscond
data.detail: to go away suddenly (to avoid arrest)

data.name: alloy
data.detail: to debase by mixing with something inferior

data.name: austere
data.detail: severely moral and strict simple and plain

data.name: clamor
data.detail: shout complain with a lot of noise

data.name: cordon
data.detail: line (of police acting as a guard)

data.name: corporeal
data.detail: physical of or for the body

data.name: cravat
data.detail: piece of linen worn as a necktie

data.name: crease
data.detail: line made by crushing white line on the ground in cricket

data.name: credulity
data.detail: too great a readiness to believe things

data.name: cumbersome
data.detail: burdensome heavy and awkward to carry

data.name: deluge
data.detail: great flood heavy rush of water

data.name: diatribe
data.detail: bitter and violent attack in words

data.name: discern
data.detail: see with an effort but clearly

data.name: dislodge
data.detail: move force from the place occupied

data.name: dissent
data.detail: have a different opinion refuse to assent

data.name: dogmatic
data.detail: positive certain arbitrary without room for discussion

data.name: dormant
data.detail: in a state of inactivity but awaiting development

data.name: dote
data.detail: show much fondness center one's attention

data.name: drone
data.detail: male bee person who isn't self-employed

data.name: dud
data.detail: no use person smth that fails

data.name: dwarf
data.detail: person or smb much below the usual size

data.name: dynamo
data.detail: a generator something that produces electric current

data.name: fawn
data.detail: young deer try to win smb's favor

data.name: feud
data.detail: bitter quarrel over a long period of time

data.name: florid
data.detail: very much ornamented naturally red (e.g.. of face)

data.name: flout
data.detail: reject mock to go against (as in going against tradition)

data.name: ford
data.detail: shallow place in a river (to cross)

data.name: forestall
data.detail: prevent by taking action in advance preempt

data.name: forge
data.detail: workshop for the shaping of metal to shape metal lead

data.name: frantic
data.detail: wildly excited with joy pain anxiety

data.name: fringe
data.detail: edge ornamental border part of hair over the forehead

data.name: glib
data.detail: ready and smooth but not sincere

data.name: gloat
data.detail: over look at with selfish delight

data.name: glut
data.detail: supply to much fill to excess

data.name: goad
data.detail: smth urging a person to action

data.name: gorge
data.detail: eat greedily/narrow opening with a stream

data.name: gouge
data.detail: tool for cutting grooves in wood

data.name: graze
data.detail: touch or scrape lightly in passing

data.name: gust
data.detail: outburst of feeling sudden rain wind fire etc.

data.name: imminent
data.detail: likely to come or happen soon

data.name: impede
data.detail: hinder get in the way of

data.name: impending
data.detail: imminent being about to happen expected

data.name: impetuous
data.detail: having sudden energy impulsive thrusting ahead forceful

data.name: implicate
data.detail: show that smb has a share

data.name: impute
data.detail: to attribute to a cause or source ascribe

data.name: inclined
data.detail: directing the mind in a certain direction

data.name: incongruous
data.detail: out of place not in harmony or agreement

data.name: indistinct
data.detail: not easily heard seen clearly marked

data.name: indulge
data.detail: gratify give way to satisfy allow oneself

data.name: inept
data.detail: unskillful said or done at the wrong time

data.name: ingenuous
data.detail: naive young artless frank honest sincere

data.name: inscrutable
data.detail: incapable of being discovered or understood

data.name: insinuate
data.detail: suggest unpleasantly make a way for smth gently

data.name: insurrection
data.detail: rising of people to open resistance to

data.name: loll
data.detail: rest to sit or stand in a lazy way hang (dog's tongue)

data.name: lurk
data.detail: be out of view ready to attack

data.name: massacre
data.detail: cruel killing of a large number of people

data.name: maudlin
data.detail: sentimental in a silly or tearful way

data.name: miser
data.detail: person who loves wealth and spends little

data.name: moderation
data.detail: quality of being limited not extreme

data.name: molt
data.detail: moult lose hair feathers before new growing

data.name: mundane
data.detail: worldly as opposed to spiritual commonplace everyday

data.name: nostrum
data.detail: a quack remedy an untested cure

data.name: parenthesis
data.detail: sentence within another one smth separated

data.name: pariah
data.detail: an outcast a rejected and despised person

data.name: partisan
data.detail: one-sided committed to a party biased or prejudiced

data.name: patron
data.detail: regular customer person who gives support

data.name: pious
data.detail: dutiful to parents devoted to religion

data.name: pique
data.detail: hurt the pride or self-respect stir (curiosity)

data.name: pitfall
data.detail: covered hole as a trap unsuspected danger

data.name: pith
data.detail: essential part force soft liquid substance

data.name: pivotal
data.detail: of great importance (others depend on it)

data.name: plaque
data.detail: flat metal on a wall as a memorial

data.name: platitude
data.detail: a trite or banal statement unoriginality

data.name: plead
data.detail: address a court of law as an advocate

data.name: pliant
data.detail: pliable easily bent shaped or twisted

data.name: pluck
data.detail: pull the feathers off pick (e.g.. flowers)

data.name: plunge
data.detail: move quickly suddenly and with force

data.name: premature
data.detail: doing or happening smth before the right time

data.name: prevaricate
data.detail: to equivocate to stray from the truth

data.name: pristine
data.detail: primitive unspoiled pure as in earlier times unadulterated

data.detail: nearness in time or place affinity of nature

data.name: pugnacious
data.detail: fond of in the habit of fighting

data.name: pyre

data.name: qualm
data.detail: feeling of doubt temporary feeling of sickness

data.name: rabble
data.detail: mob crowd the lower classes of populace

data.detail: disown refuse to accept or pay

data.detail: long strip worn round the waist

data.name: sermon
data.detail: reproving a person for his faults

data.name: slate
data.detail: king of blue-grey stone propose criticize

data.name: sobriety
data.detail: quality or condition of being sober

data.name: solvent
data.detail: of the power of forming a solution

data.name: spear
data.detail: weapon with a metal point on a long shaft

data.name: specious
data.detail: illogical of questionable truth or merit

data.name: sponge
data.detail: porous rubber for washing live at once expense

data.name: spurn
data.detail: have nothing to do reject or refuse

data.name: stanch
data.detail: to stop the flow of a fluid

data.name: stickler
data.detail: person who insists on importance of smth

data.name: stint
data.detail: to be thrifty to set limits

data.name: stipulate
data.detail: state or put forward as a necessary condition

data.name: submerge
data.detail: put under water liquid sink out of sight

data.detail: cause or have difficulty in breathing

data.name: superfluous
data.detail: more then is needed or wanted

data.name: supine
data.detail: lying on the back slow to act passive

data.detail: prevent from being known put an end to
